# sakura_iam_sso (Data Source)

Get information about an existing IAM SSO profile.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_iam_sso" "foobar" {
  name = "foobar"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the IAM SSO.
- `name` (String) The name of the IAM SSO.

### Read-Only

- `assigned` (Boolean) Whether the IAM SSO is assigned
- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp of the IAM SSO
- `description` (String) The description of the IAM SSO.
- `idp_certificate` (String) The IdP certificate of the IAM SSO
- `idp_entity_id` (String) The IdP entity ID of the IAM SSO
- `idp_login_url` (String) The IdP login URL of the IAM SSO
- `idp_logout_url` (String) The IdP logout URL of the IAM SSO
- `sp_acs_url` (String) The SP ACS URL of the IAM SSO
- `sp_entity_id` (String) The SP entity ID of the IAM SSO
- `updated_at` (String) The last update timestamp of the IAM SSO
